# Zodiac

## Category
Crypto

## Description
Note: The flag for this challenge is in a non-standard format. It will be obvious if you've solved the challenge correct.

```

```

## Solution
Base64 decode the message:
```
X~6b>~eb|C]cEP>~f)eFzeCz86>sb5Cn>8g(&tUC~j>f)J~>bb6j|ihej()iHEogCej|J|6qzhh1o)WcigJ(&OieWF1sS0>ej6ioSzg5sIsh>`5()XSH1~1Iz8sCsEb|&4o1A*ibCbi0JC*o~\)z6fi`zg5IczW5(&}FzeCj\ihs(Cios6Jb51](Iz8sIP11s()iosIn8E0I8\e)H5@&&XIWi88Ee6h1J~6PhEHCehz`1b'IXC0>bbIsh>on&Oze|)~\)eF1)b55f=6Kbb)~>H|JSX)ji`|C58v\U|s&Bc1iebU(SFi`5Cf*PP1c1sIgc5zebU(SqE~F60>~FC~F\J5&}jzeIbE`5sIH|(6iosIibEo5'6\86JF\c5(CzosS0F18&}jcE*gjIJW*ss>8g6s>fnJS~j5)cz>oUIyUzs1f&#1r~)~j5Ss>HIfWh|1o@SXIzH6q5WEH5Iz6oiH5'&$EhSzb0zUJSc\zH>8g60>~jSzIF*8gcUSF5zc~&O*WFIji`56X)J158Ii8s6n8\0oC76W\s1I\PIH|8&Kos6Hzoo|cJ(IWb>Hie5J()W\*oW>bJ(IgE`1c8H1oef(&OUf|bPC8\~)b1zfe()q*eSjE8\c5sC\P)eF1H)zbb(C7&KosIsc*8nCs|b>gFeS\PCqz~~b1)0>eFIHUS]1|cf(&$zcSEoC~j|Sh>8g>ogC]bz>8JC\PSJjisUS~EUJ@&XSiH6zS]ih~C\PCzbbC~jz~SX6ji`1)H|e'&D|~IzbbC1r]1h>18W|I>f6zoCzcWFS0j1h1ejc\_&Bb1iHf)~Fie)*8~hi`1bb_sC0\cbs60FEf16Hicg>oIPzs1J&&$\cI5`|c6iosSPEcC1`1cC0j|oIXIHE`5@&y\0)s*bb)>~I>f)eE)]z*f|(6eE)Hzn5SzoC58s(&}E)h*J~I*8q*ho>fj_s(68\e6~EIJF>o1C>oS*f|d&KfSej\_6e\Iqc1z~F|C05c1Ib>P1d)">P1I]>b1sCE8Cb>P5&R1c16zbbC~EESb>~~b1(Ii8sCEPIE81I~\IH5&">~~b5)c5Hz>oJ=6q*~)5`1hU6FE*hI>JCfz`1s&$c\H)~jz~C1~5cozb)f>b|8W5(IfEH|~j>og)HEh5(&KIqc>og5hIEP6o|0IeF>8gf'Cios)`>b5S>eI05h1&$\cIJ\H|)~Fc11)p*oJI~ECJ~Ec1Cios6jEzcs)HUf|bP(&K8sS~F>JCghiUSJ]>c>eSU|iho>ogI>8Is5f>h1&}\CPEbbE0Cn8E0b5sg1Ib>n56iIJ>on>8gIWb\*s(&t5UEosS~j1C*~HEfeCqE*8s)\P)F*Hzo6ej\*gF~@&&PbzgI>f6zbbFz>b~j|f>8g*bzc>eU@&&}j>fC>J6HUSJEo()H>8|6E08I}5b5HzWj*f(&}\)0jEHSXIb|i`1S~F1)n|UJ6~E)HUIsc>`|(&R|bb7bE`|s6EPSH|(Cs>fW5ho>8gS~ESP*bP>bb&}j>fCbiqEh(IqU6JbE0)]c*s18W|6eECHzn5)H>bs&K)h*gg1sS]5\]b1(CiosCejh\*gF6fEP~Ss|gc|5f&p*qs*5)~j|HIe\6ej|S*J|P*bIi8sSej1)gE\s@&O\f~)qbiH1b5fJ)>JSj|(CW1o~1c5s)>o)~j|If]j1h|&QP6W\HHE8)s*e>5f(Is5W|o~6oEe)eECPz>b&Xo)EPP>W5fCEP6c|H\~|81Jf(Cz8sI]zU&O1|eIis\hze>\8Ie\SHUSFiWn>8gSg\sf(&Rj|oSX)iH6g\8|@6y5)0EhnJCF>f)0\cn(IXSH>o5@&&}F|c1)b>5JIeF16]Ec~'Sej|C]zhJ|hI]*PPfCj>J6Ji>b'&}F5c16gbE\HJ)~F|Iszhn(6~j5Sqc\zs)NCpEPe0ih5IHzvEhf(&p\*bf)~Fze)jz`5S~E>b5s(Szos)0cE*gj~(Sz8sCejE*gFeC0>~FIH5)7&&}jie)5`1h)0>~jSi)PcE *Jj)W\8Jezo~f)~EIej5)f~zWnSHiWj>85f(S&K8sCf>~e>8gC0|bb6>o6\cs1cCfH>~|&}j5Sf\*8s>8g)P*hh\0f'6P\c6HU6]*c]EJ|IFEbsf&}EIfi>bIq1U\osIeF1)#O6JeiWnJ(CzosIeF56qzejJ&QP)ibb)~F1)01fe5h8Cf~zcf(6*8e>bIXIs>5@&X~IHzU)q5I~jz~)~F|6BQQBC0>bbI0zfFS*f6sE08'&Xe)HzU6q5S05IJFibb6~\*WjIeF5)yiJ~UC">n|J(&Kos)f|1)~F5)gh1ie6}*h>og(C0jEH)0|)n8|0@&&}FE*gFIH*WF6>J)~zn5o(IH*WFSzq>s1J'6i8sCeFE_&R|Czh5)oEeCo\06ejie6f~h|8g~j)0F>WjI>86EbsIszUf&O\`|sS5zh~F6z8sIF5z`18(C~ji~I0F>WFI01Izh1(S&056zc|(&Qo1S5A*ibC~1H]5c)\PCF|c\>WIj1ih~f(&Ois|C0|znCqUS~>H16zosSPie1(Cq*~)feh\og6>oC0>bb&}\)f~h>`1(I~\Sf51n(I~E)P>os(&z8s)8EeIe\CU>|bs6{WEoeh\b-@
```

Run the Base64 Decoded message through a [Zodiac Decipher tool](http://zodiackillerciphers.com/azdecrypt-lite/), returns a slightly messy form of the poem [Ulysses by Alfred Lord Tennyson](https://poets.org/poem/ulysses): 
```

```

When compared to original poem there is a line that is differing:
```
TTLITTLESPROFITSSTHATSANTIDLESKING
INGYSTHISSSTILLTHEARTHISAMONGSTHESETBARRENSCRAGS
INMATCHEDSWITHTANSAGEDADRIVEISISMETEAANDSDOLE
NONEDUALSLAWSSUNTOSATSAVAGEARACE
INTHATSHOARDISANDTSLEEPIAANDAFEEDISANDAKNOWANOTSME
INNIACANNOTTRESTTFROMSTRAVELIAISWILLADRINK
NMATESTOSTHESLEESATALLSTIMESSISHAVESENJOYED
NCREATLYISHAVESSUFFEREDAGREATLYISBOTHTWITHSTHOSE
NTHATALOVEDAMEITANDAALONEITONTSHOREISANDSWHEN
NTHROUGHASCUDDINGTDISKSSTHESRAINYAHYADES
NTEXTSTHESDIMASCREENISIAAMTBECOMEAATNAME
INFORSALWAYSSROAMINGTWITHSAAHUNGRYSHEART
NMUCHAHAVETISSEENAANDTKNOWNSITCODEAOFAMEN
NANDTMANNERSIACLIMATESISCOUNCILSIAGOVERNMENTS
INMYSELFSNOTSLEASTISBUTSHONOREDSOFSTHEMSALL
ISINANDADRUNKSDELIGHTSOFSBATTLESWITHAMYSPEERS
INFARSONSTHESRINGINGSPLAINSSOFSSHADYSTOYS
INISAMTASPARTSOFSALLSTHATSITHAVESMET
INGETAALLSEXPERIENCEAISTANSARCHSWHERETHROU
NCLEAMSSTHATSUNTRAVELLUDSWORLDTWHOSETMARGINAFADES
NNFORAEVERTANDSFORSEVERSWHENAIAMOVE
INHOWSDULLSITAISSTOSPAUSEITTOSMAKESANSEND
INTOSRUSTAUNBURNISHUDITNOTTTOASHINESINSUSE
INASSTHOUTTOABREATHESWEREALIFEISWIFEAPILEDSONSLIFE
NTERETALLSTOOSLITTLEIAANDSOFAONEATOAME
NWITTLESREMAINSATBUTSEVERYTHOURAISSSAVED
NFROMSTHATSETERNALSSILENCEIASOMETHINGSMORE
INAABRINGERAOFTNEWATHINGSISANDSVILESITAWERE
NFORASOMESTHREESTUNSATOSSTORESANDTHOARDSMYSELF
INANDSTHISSGRAYSSPIRITSYEARNINGAINADESIRE
NTOSFOLLOWSKNOWLEDGEALIKETAASINKINGACLOUD
INGEYONDSTHESUTMOSTSBOUNDSOFSHUMANTTHOUGHT

INNFLAGAISSALLHAILTHESINGULARITY

INNTHISSISTMYSSONISMINETOWNATELEMACHUS
INTOSWHOMSIALEAVESTHESKEYSTTOSMYADRIVE
INTELLILOVEDTOFSMEISDISCERNINGSTOSFULFILL
NTHISSLABORIABYTSLOWSPRUDENCETTOSMAKESMILD
NASRUGGEDSPEOPLEISANDSTHROUGHTSOFTSDEGREES
NTUBDUESTHEMATOTTHESUSEFULAANDSTHESGOOD
INMOSTSBLAMELESSSISSHEISCENTEREDSINSTHEASPHERE
NOFTCOMMONSDUTIESIADECENTTNOTSTOSFAIL
NINSOFFICESSOFTREMOTENESSISANDAPAY
NMEETAADORATIONATOSMYSHACKINGSGODS
INTHENSISAMTGONEITHESWORKSSHISSWORKIAISMINE
INNTHERESLIESATHETPORTISTHESPARSERAPUFFSSHISTSAIL
INTHERETGLOOMSSTHEADARKITTHESBROADSUSTOFTWAREAMAJORSIN
TOULSSTHATSHAVESTOILEDISANDSWROUGHTISANDSTHOUGHTSWITHAME
SINNTHATSEVERSWITHSASFRO
```

Following line can be found:
```
FLAGAISSALLHAILTHESINGULARITY
```

Which says (with the gibberish removed):
```
FLAG IS ALLHAILTHESINGULARITY
```

Flag: `ALLHAILTHESINGULARITY`
